name: Minimal Haze
description:
Shoot Blocks, Dodge Bullets, That's About It

Also you gain a Multiplier for not letting blocks past you

Spend your Multiplier for a shield to protect you from bullets

---

Tap (Or click) and drag to move

Tap to Shield

Let go to slow down

Mobile Friendly (Hence the Aspect Ratio)

1 Button mode available (Wait for options in main menu)

Tap to change direction

Hit edge to Shield

---
